subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Roberto Alomar was selected in his second year on the ballot with 90 percent of the vote, Bert Blyleven in his 14th with 79.7 percent of the vote.
snippet: Roberto Alomar was selected in his second year on the ballot with 90 percent of the vote, Bert Blyleven in his 14th with 79.7 percent of the vote.
